scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run sass-lint && npm run styles && npm run scripts && npm run fonts && npm run images
scripts.scripts: mkdir -p assets/public/scripts && cat assets/source/scripts/*.js | npx esbuild --minify > assets/public/scripts/pul-base.scripts.min.js
scripts.styles: npx sass assets/source/styles:assets/public/styles -I node_modules/bourbon/app/assets/stylesheets -I node_modules/susy/sass -I node_modules/breakpoint-sass/stylesheets -I node_modules/normalize.css
